title: Do the IIMs accept NIOS scores of class 12th if one appears for NIOS examination after graduation in order to score good marks? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to MHRD NIOS is a centralised board so no institution can discard it ,but in IIMs they would require a very strong reason for calling you as NIOS is generally believed to be given by poor scorers . Moreover if u get call then you should have a great answer in tackling there trick question about why you chose NIOS. So focus on CAT and hope for best. Sorry if I said some strong and bitter words but its true and help u in long run. UPVOTE if helpful
